recent_suggestions.suggestion_text:
**💡 CURSOR RULE SUGGESTION**
<!--thread-root-1972640658-->

I suggest creating a new rules file called `.cursor/rules/001-core-standards.mdc` as follows:

<!--rule-generation-output
{"should_generate": true, "reason": "This comment provides a clear, specific styling guideline that applies across the codebase.", "operation": "create", "file_path": ".cursor/rules/001-core-standards.mdc", "changes": [{"type": "addition", "content": "# CSS Layout Standards\n\nThis repository uses specific layout approaches for consistency.\n\n- Always use Flexbox for layouts, never use CSS Grid\n- Prefer Tailwind classes over inline styles when possible\n- For component layouts, use flex-based approaches with appropriate flex properties", "text_to_replace": null, "existing_content_context": null, "is_new_file": true, "file_globs": ["**/*.tsx", "**/*.jsx", "**/*.css"], "file_description": "Core standards for code style and patterns"}]}
-->


**Description:**
```
Core standards for code style and patterns
```

**Globs:**
```
"**/*.tsx", "**/*.jsx", "**/*.css"
```
Content:
```diff
+ # CSS Layout Standards
+ 
+ This repository uses specific layout approaches for consistency.
+ 
+ - Always use Flexbox for layouts, never use CSS Grid
+ - Prefer Tailwind classes over inline styles when possible
+ - For component layouts, use flex-based approaches with appropriate flex properties
```

Check the box below to add this suggestion to the summary of suggested changes. **Clicking will NOT commit anything to the PR.**
- [ ] Accept this suggestion?
